items.title: Respond to customer inquiries
items.description: Answer customer questions via phone, email, chat, and social media channels promptly and accurately.

items.title: Troubleshoot technical issues
items.description: Diagnose and resolve customer technical problems through systematic problem-solving approaches.

items.title: Document support tickets
items.description: Record customer issues, solutions, and interactions in ticketing systems for tracking and analysis.

items.title: Escalate complex issues
items.description: Identify when problems require specialized expertise and transfer cases to appropriate teams.

items.title: Follow up with customers
items.description: Contact customers after issue resolution to ensure satisfaction and gather feedback.

items.title: Update knowledge base
items.description: Contribute to and maintain support documentation, FAQs, and troubleshooting guides.

items.title: Monitor support metrics
items.description: Track response times, resolution rates, and customer satisfaction scores to maintain service quality.

items.title: Handle billing inquiries
items.description: Assist customers with account issues, payment problems, and subscription management.

items.title: Provide product training
items.description: Educate customers on product features, best practices, and optimal usage strategies.

items.title: Collaborate with product team
items.description: Share customer feedback and feature requests with product development teams.

items.title: Manage live chat support
items.description: Provide real-time assistance through website chat systems and instant messaging platforms.

items.title: Process returns and refunds
items.description: Handle customer requests for product returns, exchanges, and refund processing.

items.title: Conduct customer surveys
items.description: Gather customer feedback through surveys and interviews to improve service quality.

items.title: Train new support staff
items.description: Mentor and train new team members on support processes, tools, and customer service skills.

items.title: Maintain CRM records
items.description: Update customer relationship management systems with accurate contact and interaction data.

items.title: Handle social media support
items.description: Respond to customer complaints and inquiries on social media platforms professionally.

items.title: Create support reports
items.description: Generate regular reports on ticket volumes, common issues, and team performance metrics.

items.title: Coordinate with technical support
items.description: Work with technical teams to resolve complex issues requiring specialized knowledge.

items.title: Manage support queue
items.description: Prioritize and distribute incoming support requests to ensure timely responses.

items.title: Develop support processes
items.description: Improve and streamline customer service workflows and standard operating procedures.

items.title: Identify service improvements
items.description: Analyze customer feedback and support trends to recommend service enhancements.
